author: sdeboy
msg: Now reselecting the previously selected row after a refilter operation
Also updated code to ensure requested row in a call to scrollToRow is determined on the EDT

author: lektran
msg: Deprecated (renamed) org.ofbiz.party.party.PartyWorker.findMatchingPartyAndPostalAddress(...), use findMatchingPersonPostalAddresses(...) instead.  Includes minor javadoc change.

author: lektran
msg: Extract Method getMatchingPartyPostalAddress(...) from getMatchingPartyAndPostalAddress and add a partyTypeId parameter to the extracted method, this allows the address matching portion of the code to be reused in various party matching methods e.g. Person vs. Company

author: lektran
msg: Replace a long "if not empty" block with an "if empty" early return, no functional changes
